thread.title: Odisha Govt Jobs 2017 – 51 Sr Resident/ Tutor Posts
thread.title_full: Odisha Govt Jobs 2017 – 51 Sr Resident/ Tutor Posts

author: publisher12
title: Odisha Govt Jobs 2017 – 51 Sr Resident/ Tutor Posts
text: 10. Radio diagnosis: 02 Posts 11. Anaesthesiology: 04 Posts 12. O & G: 02 Posts 13. Community Medicine (Lady Medical Officer): 02 Posts 14. Dentistry: 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age must not be above 35 years as on 01-01-2017. Upper age limit will be relaxed by 5 years for SEBC/ Woman/ ST/ SC/ Ex. Serviceman, 10 years for PH candidates as per rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess MD/ MS/ MDS Degree in concerned discipline for Senior Resident post in clinical departments of broad specialties, MBBS/ BDS is the basic qualification for the post of Tutor for Pre/ Para clinical/ Dentistry disciplines (In case of non-availability of sufficient number of MBBS candidates, M.Sc. degree in Medical Anatomy/ Medical Physiology/ Medical Biochemistry/ Medical Pharmacology/ Medical Microbiology will be considered). Selection Process: Selection will be based on career assessment. Application Fee: Candidates should pay Rs.1000/- by Damnd Draft drawn in favour of ‘Dean & Principal, Saheed Laxman Nayak Medical College and Hospital, Koraput’ payable at SBI Koraput. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may send their applications along with self attested photocopies of One passport size recent colour photograph signed & affixed, qualification, Mark sheets, Registration certificate, Service Certificate form Govt of Odisha, No Objection Certificate, Caste certificate, PH certificate by Registered Post/ Speed Post only with Superscription “Application for the post of
